title: Tech cos oppose DCC call on E band allotment to telcos - Economic Times
content: Tech cos oppose DCC call on E band allotment to telcos  Economic Times
description: Last week, the DCC, the highest decision-making body of the DoT, accepted Trais recommendations on base prices of 5G airwaves. Among other key decisions it has backed need-based, circle-wise allocation of E-band spectrum to telcos initially via the administrative route, with a rider that telcos would have to pay for these airwaves in future based on an auction-based pricing mechanism determined by the regulator.
